00040   class TBL_table {
00041     // Class variables
00042     var $columnsNumber;         
00043     var $rowsNumber;            
00044     var $caption;               
00045     var $columns=array();       
00046     var $rows=array();          
00047     protected $eh;              
00048 
00054     function __construct() {
00055       $this->eh=ER_Handler::getInstance();
00056     }
00057 
00058     // Class functions
00059 
00067     function setColumns($columns){
00068       // If parameters are missing...
00069       if (empty ($columns) || !is_array($columns)){
00070                                 // Display an error and return false
00071         $source="table::setColumns()";
00072         $message="Wrong or missing columns values !";
00073         $hint="Please provide the \$columns array for this function.";
00074                                 $this->eh->logError($source, $message, $hint);
00075                                 return false;
00076       }
00077       // Else register the columns names.
00078       else {
00079         $this->columns=$columns;
00080                                 $this->columnsNumber=count($columns);
00081                                 return true;
00082       }
00083     }
00084 
00094     function addRow($row){
00095       // If parameters are missing...
00096       if (empty ($row) || !is_array($row)){
00097                                 // Display an error and return false
00098         $source="table::addRow()";
00099         $message="Wrong or missing row array !";
00100         $hint="Please provide the \$row array for this function.";
00101                                 $this->eh->logError($source, $message, $hint);
00102         return false;
00103       }
00104       // Else register the row.
00105       else {
00106         $this->rows[]=$row;
00107       }
00108     }
00109     
00116     function setCaption($caption){
00117       // If parameters are missing...
00118       if (empty($caption)){
00119                                 // Display an error and return false
00120         $source="table::setCaption()";
00121         $message="Missing caption !";
00122         $hint="Please provide \$caption for this function.";
00123         $this->eh->logError($source, $message, $hint);
00124               return false;
00125       }
00126       // Else set the table's caption.
00127       $this->caption=$caption;
00128                         return true;
00129     }
00130     
00140     function displayRow($rowNumber, $print=0){
00141       // If parameters are missing...
00142       if (!is_array($this->rows[$rowNumber])){
00143                                 // Display an error and return false
00144         $source="table::displayRow()";
00145         $message="Missing row number !";
00146         $hint="Please provide \$rowNumber for this function.";
00147                                 $this->eh->logError($source, $message, $hint);
00148                                 return false;
00149       }
00150       $output="  <tr>\n";
00151       foreach($this->rows[$rowNumber] as $field){
00152         $output.="    <td>";
00153                                 $output.=(!empty($field))?$field:"&nbsp;";
00154                                 $output.= "</td>\n";
00155       }
00156       $output.="  </tr>\n";
00157       // If $print is true, echo it NOW !
00158       if ($print){
00159         echo $output;
00160                                 return true;
00161       }
00162       // Else return it for differed display.
00163       return $output;
00164     }
00165 
00173     function displayHeaders($print=0){
00174       $output="  <tr>\n";
00175       foreach($this->columns as $field){
00176         $output.="    <th>";
00177         $output.=(!empty($field))?$field:"&nbsp;";
00178         $output.="</th>\n";
00179       }
00180       $output.="  </tr>\n";
00181       // If $print is true, echo it NOW !
00182       if ($print){
00183         echo $output;
00184                                 return true;
00185       }
00186       // Else return it for differed display.
00187       return $output;
00188     }
00189 
00199     function displayTable($headerRepeat=0, $print=0){
00200       $output="<!-- Begin table -->\n";
00201       $output.="<table cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\">\n";
00202       $output.="<caption>".$this->caption."</caption>\n";
00203       $output.=$this->displayHeaders(false);
00204       for ($rowNumber=0; $rowNumber<count($this->rows); $rowNumber++){
00205                 // Should we display the headers this time ? Yes, if the table is
00206                 // not empty, and the current row number is a multiple of 
00207                                 // $headerRepeat.
00208                                 if (($headerRepeat!=0) && ($rowNumber!=0)){
00209                                   if (($rowNumber % $headerRepeat)==0)
00210                                     $output.=$this->displayHeaders(false);
00211                                 }
00212         $output.=$this->displayRow($rowNumber, false);
00213       }
00214       $output.="</table>\n";
00215       $output.="<!-- End table -->\n";
00216       // If $print is true, echo it NOW !
00217       if ($print){
00218         echo $output;
00219         return true;
00220       }
00221       // Else return it for differed display.
00222       return $output;
00223     }
